DOC.brief_summary: In this study we will try to show that performing Doppler of the Spiral arteries is doable. No outcome will be followed at this stage
DOC.brief_title: Doppler Assesment of Blood Flow in the Spiral Arteries
DOC.detailed_description: This will only be a pilot study to show that we can acurately perform Doppler studies of the spiral arteries
DOC.criteria: Pregnancy 1st trimester Not willing to participate
